downloaded 28 April 2009 from http://imaginary-project.net/download

C# bindings for Qt Windows Open Source Edition version 4.4.0 and QScintilla2

Installation of Microsoft's Visual C++ runtime is needed: http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?familyid=9B2DA534-3E03-4391-8A4D-074B9F2BC1BF&displaylang=en

The assemblies qt-dotnet.dll and qscintilla.dll are .NET assemblies and should be used as references in your C# (or VB.NET or ...) project.
